notes.text:
Wanted to hit KoG with Archfiends, got to a 3-win streak in Legend 3 around 63 season-wins and then I got tilted over the next hundred games or so. I figured, if I've got prismatic sages + willpower, might as well use 'em.

Princess is the gal you wanna see in your hand. So versatile, you can attack with a mon, then use Princess to tag it out for Queen. Sage is probably the least useful mon but I'm running her because as I mentioned, they're prismatic. I can't say I've gotten too many useful backrow pops off of her. I'd consider even running Fighters here because getting hit with WoD is still a possibility, and very unpleasant.

W1) D-heros. Banished all his resources and attacked for game.
W2) Another D-heros who suffered the same fate
W3) Spellbooks centred around dropping my Atk to 0 using WoD and then boosting up a single spellcaster to 4000 that was promptly thwarted by Econ
W4) Masked E-heros (Neos). It didn't work
W5) Destiny Calling D-heros, he got me down to 400 LP but ran out of steam
